scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:migration && npm run test:e2e:ci
scripts.test:unit: node --test test/utils.test.js test/undo.test.js test/moveTray.test.js test/notification.test.js test/markdown.test.js test/checkboxShortcut.test.js test/uploadData.test.js test/urlNormalization.test.js test/io-compatibility.test.js test/hooks.test.js test/hookViewDialog.test.js test/hamburger.test.js test/foldPersistence.test.js test/focus.test.js test/deserializeOrder.test.js test/crossTabSync.test.js test/contextMenu.test.js test/autoUpload.test.js test/updateData.test.js test/unfoldAll.test.js test/trayLink.test.js test/taskDone.test.js test/serializeAsync.test.js test/pluginSystem.test.js test/multiDrag.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:migration && npm run test:e2e:ci
